meanings.definition: Of or relating to the petrous part of the temporal bone.
meanings.sent1: The petrosal bone is located near the ear.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the petrosal structure in the skull.
meanings.sent3: The petrosal area of the bone seemed to have its own personality.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as a petrosal foundation.
meanings.sent5: The petrosal details of the bone were etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a rock.
meanings.sent1: The petrosal texture of the wall made it look like stone.
meanings.sent2: The petrosal surface of the sculpture was rough to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The petrosal appearance of the cake made it seem like a delicious rock.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a petrosal quality that echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The petrosal landscape stretched out before them, majestic and unyielding.
